name: 王賢達
schedule:
1. Cotton(2 weeks)
2. Jute(1/2 week)
3. Wool(2 weeks)
4. Silk(1 week)
5. Acetate Fiber(1/2 week)
6. Rayon(1 week)
7. PET, PBT(1 and 1/2 weeks)
Mid-term Exam(1 week)
8. Nylons(1 week)
9. PAN, Carbon Fiber(1 week)
10. Polyolefin Fibers(1 week)
11.PVA Fiber(1/2 week)
12. Elastomeric Fibers(1/2 week)
13. Aramide Fibers(1 week)
14. Mechanical Properties of Textile Fibers(1 week)
15. Physical Properties of Textile Fibers(1 and 1/2 weeks)
Final Exam(1 week)
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance(30%)
Mid-term Exam(30%)
Final Exam(40%)
materials:
Handbook of Fiber Chemistry(M.Lewin ed. 3rd ed. CRC, 2006)
Physical Properties of Textile Fibers(J.W.S.Hearle and W.E.Morton 4th ed.CRC Press, 2008)
Fiber Science(S.B.Warner Prentice Hall, 1995)
